code: import fromUnixTime from"date-fns/fromUnixTime";import getDate from"date-fns/getDate";import getMonth from"date-fns/getMonth";import getYear from"date-fns/getYear";export var getBirthdayDate=function getBirthdayDate(date){var day=getDate(fromUnixTime(date));var month=getMonth(fromUnixTime(date))+1;var year=getYear(fromUnixTime(date));return day+"."+month+"."+year;};
